Title: Ken Harker - Politics
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 22:51:54 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 5118 Last-Modified: Monday, 28-Oct-96 02:57:12 GMT Ken Harker - Politics K en H arker - P olitics I am a semi-active member of the Republican party, and have previously served as Secretary and Acting President of Republicans at Dartmouth.
